com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.screen

Class ScreenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.screen.ScreenManager

  • public class ScreenManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all screens within the engine. Only one screen object can be instantiated at any given time, if the screen manager switches screens the new screen object is instantiated and the old one is disposed.

    The ScreenManager class is also responsible for triggering onActivated, onDeactivated and onResize(int, int)

    Author:
    Maxstupo

      • registerScreen

        public ScreenManager registerScreen(java.lang.String id,
                                    java.lang.Class<? extends AbstractScreen> screen)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Register a screen with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id the given screen is associated with.
        screen - the screen to register.
        Returns:
        this object for chaining.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given screen or id are null, or the given id is already registered within this screen manager.
